title: Chapter 1092 - A Plan
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1092 - A Plan

The Heavensdeath Demon Empress suddenly changed tacks. She laughed, “Alas, the Nine Heavens Pavilion has no idea how important Big Brother Su is to me. Even if they offered me countless cultivation methods for the Three Realms of the Path of Heaven’s Ascension, I wouldn’t even look at them.”

She sat on the cliffside, and she was shorter than the reclining Su Yi to begin with.

From Su Yi’s position, he could naturally see the places her red dress couldn’t cover. A certain deep, snowy ravine was particularly eye-catching…

But Su Yi was in no mood to admire it. It seemed he was pondering something. “How strong is the Sixth Warden?”

“Strong,” said the Heavensdeath Demon Empress. Her smile disappeared, and after a moment’s thought, “Definitely a peerless figure with extraordinary talent. The Warden’s foundations are exceptional, and he's only been cultivating for eight thousand years, but he's already in the mid-stage Profound Unity Realm.

“It’s worth noting that he's extremely ruthless and determined. He's steady, yet insidious, the type to eat a man alive without bothering to spit out the bones.

“That aside, he carries...
